about twice the size of the average house cat , the dappled fur of the ocelot serves as camouflage in the jungles of South and Central America .大约是平均家猫两倍大小的规模，该花纹的毛皮的豹猫作为伪装在丛林南美洲和中美洲。
daphnetin　瑞香素；二羟香豆素dappled tobacco　斑纹烟dara 印度马发［Polynemus indicus］

dappled shade is formed by deciduous trees , and shade plants as epimedium , anemone , trillium , and a variety of bulbs thrive in this type of shade .斑点树荫由落叶乔木形成，还有阴生植物，如淫羊藿，海葵，延龄草和各种各样生长在这种树荫底下的鳞茎植物。
right now I'm weighing up the pleasure of eating ice cream against my desire to stay out here lying in the dappled shade of this tree .现在，我正在衡量，到底是吃冰淇淋的乐趣多呢，还是躺在这棵大树的树荫下的欲望比较大。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (earlier as an adjective): perhaps related to Old Norse depill 'spot'

means.word_mean: 1. a small contrasting part of something;
1. colour with streaks or blotches of different shades
